column4: Hi. Anyone here experience problems with 10.4 on a laptop, when the laptop returns from hibernation or such?
Nobody running ubuntu 10.4 on a laptop?
well, it seems that half of the time, my laptop locks up when returning from longer periods of rest and/or hibernation.
great to know im not alone with this problem. :)
acpi support for laptops has always been a bit hit and miss
